customize.text: Adventure Challenge: The Stone Tells Ancient Tales

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Dear customer, I really must tell you about the time when our humble store received a famous stone that would shake Liyue to its core. Now, where should I start concerning that stone? Ah, yes. It all started when a hero discovered several suspicious hilichurls...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Hydro</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: A battle in the rain will cause both sides to trigger Elemental Reactions more easily!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Let's see how your luck is looking today, shall we, dear customer?"
Shitou opens his Casket of Tomes to reveal a deck that comprises "Stonehide Lawachurl," "Noelle," and "Xingqiu."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When Action Phase begins, the active characters on both sides will be affected by Hydro.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lawachurl Mantodipietra
customize.desc:
Lawachurl Mantodipietra, Traversavalli

Fai un giro, la strada davanti a te è il reame del "re".

customize.name: Noelle
customize.desc:
Noelle, Fiore cavalleresco

Puoi lasciare che sia lei a organizzare il tavolo da gioco. Sul serio.

customize.name: Xingqiu
customize.desc:
Xingqiu, Giovane paladino

"È una mia impressione o i protagonisti dei romanzi di oggi sono tutti studenti di una scuola privata o simili?"
